BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Remove the ability to read frozen indices (#120108) This won't be supported in 9.0. In 8.18+ we report a `CRITICAL` deprecation warning telling users to unfreeze any frozen indices (see https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/pull/119879). ES-9736 #comment Removed frozen engine registration from the plugin in https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/pull/120108
